function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Dependence on bluetooth technology for proximity tracing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to data collection and storage","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential misuse of app data by unauthorized parties","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of bluetooth low energy for contact tracing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Storage of contact data on the user’s device","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Retention of contact data on the central server","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gps location tracking of positive patients","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring financial transactions, gps location, and cctv footage","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of personal data to all individuals in the area","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Live-location tracking of patients","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contact tracing and sharing location history and contacts","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity tracking and real-time dashboard of covid-19 cases","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of sensitive user information such as age, profession, medical history, and travel history for risk assessment.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Storage of user location and bluetooth data on a centralized server.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sensitive user information between mobile devices during close contact.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of bluetooth and gps location data for contact tracing and monitoring may raise privacy concerns.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of misinformation and false self-diagnosis through the app.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on the accuracy of user-provided information for contact tracing and monitoring.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unrequired self-isolation due to self-positives","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of spreading virus by visiting hospitals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of contact tracing apps for monitoring covid-19 cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of medical care apps may lead to misdiagnosis or incorrect treatment due to lack of physical examination.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate detection of disease spread through mobile apps leading to false positives and unnecessary self-isolation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on educational apps for e-learning may result in decreased interaction and engagement, leading to reduced learning outcomes.","category":"Educational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on mobile technology for contact tracing and exposure monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid increase in use of grocery apps and delivery services","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on wi-fi, bluetooth, and gps for contact identification","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on minimum number of satellites for accurate position determination","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on aging satellites with limited lifespan","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Requirement for clear visibility of four satellites for accurate point calculation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of gps technology to monitor and record interaction frequency between infected and non-infected persons.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring user movements and alerting them based on zonal presence green zone or red zone .","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interference from devices using 2.4 ghz radio frequencies can reduce wi-fi speed or cause loss of internet connection.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wi-fi networks can be used for location tracing during the ongoing pandemic.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of data over radio waves","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through proximity detection using bluetooth le for contact tracing.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns in mhealth sensing applications due to data collection via bluetooth technology.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of unauthorized data disclosure in discoverable mode of bluetooth devices.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical development of wi-fi technology leading to current widespread adoption and usage.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bluetooth technology operates at 2.4 ghz frequency, making it more prone to hackers and privacy interference.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of bluetooth for contact tracing may raise privacy concerns and risks related to the misuse of personal data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective monitoring of infectious diseases in the population.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure of network connectivity leading to inability to access medical data and instructions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient dissemination of quality research leading to challenges for medical staff","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission risk of covid-19 through mobile applications","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious diseases through video conferencing and mhealth apps","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data privacy and security risks with storing patient information in a government database","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on mhealth for self-monitoring without professional medical guidance","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor road infrastructure and bad weather conditions impacting access to hospitals","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ambulance services in remote areas","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"}]}
